app.title: Samvargani
app.description: Samvargani is an interesting game that helps you learn Hindi. It is a great way to improve your Hindi vocabulary and is a must-have app for people interested in learning Hindi.

author.name: Aruhant Mehta
author.bio: Aruhant Mehta is a 17 year old student who is enthusiastic about computer programming and technology. He is currently learning Python and Flutter. He is also a student of the Indian classical dance Kathak.

page1.title: Welcome to Samvargani - the daily Hindi word game!
page1.body: Guess an interesting new word everyday and improve your Hindi vocabulary!

page2.title: You will be shown the length and structure of the word.
page2.body: You will also be shown the half letters and matras of the target word.

page3.title: The colours of the cell together indicate the correctness of the your word.

page4.title: Can you guess the word using the following guesses?
page4.body: Tap on a cell if you have any confusion with its colour and meaning.
